Text:
The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many tongues?  
 Do we speak? 
 Does AI know what your ancestors felt?

Can bots translate  -
 The taste at the tip of a tongue? 
 The fragrance of a wildflower? 
 The caress of wrinkled hands? 
 Tears of joy; ripples of laughter?

The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many hands? 
 Hold us afloat? 
 Does AI know how compassion feels? 
 Can bots heal?
Can anyone live without a mother?

Is there anyone left to protect another human from a cruel fate? 
 Is there anyone left to nurture a child in time?

Is there anyone left to protect and nurture another? -
 For the future and the past, for the present and the future

To the left, to the right, to the inside and the outside 
 To all of you, keep your hands in reach to help
DO: Donâ€™t give to feel better. Do it as you too receive.
